price: Аллах силерге эскертет: Ага окшогон нерсеге эч качан кайтпагыла, эгер ыймандуу болсоңор!
arabic: يَعِظُكُمُ ٱللَّهُ أَن تَعُودُواْ لِمِثۡلِهِۦٓ أَبَدًا إِن كُنتُم مُّؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Kyrgyz translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Kyrgyz language, translated by Shams al-Din Hakimov Abd al-Khaleq, reviewed and developed under the supervision of the Rowad Translation Center.

meta.transliteration: yaʿiẓukumu al-lahu an taʿūdū limith'lihi abadan in kuntum mu'minīna
